description: You just got home from buying some groceries. You want the robot to stock your pantry so that all items are easily accessible.
requirements: Organize the cereals by height so they are all visible.
Chips take up a lot of space but are soft. Stack them by flavor, but keep one packet of the green chips on the counter to eat now.
Organize your soda bottles so that the label is always visible.
Do not let items of different categories touch each other.
Do not perform any actions that are not explicitly mentioned in the requirements.
